benchmark_details.name: LONG REASON ARENA
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark specifically designed to assess the long reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs) through algorithmic execution.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the long reasoning capabilities of LLMs through algorithm execution, reflecting retrieval and backtracking tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The evaluation primarily focuses on deductive reasoning and may not encompass all reasoning forms.

data.annotation: Problems are curated and categorized based on expected reasoning steps.

methodology.calculation: Model performance is measured based on the correctness of outputs against expected algorithmic results.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better long reasoning capabilities of the model.
methodology.baseline_results: Deepseek-R1 achieves only 7.5% accuracy on Level 3 tasks.
methodology.validation: Validation conducted through algorithmic execution and performance analysis of multiple models.
